Do you know the people who make your period products? 🩸 We do, because we work with them everyday, so why not share it with our community? Meet the real people who bring you comfort to your period with every stitch - the dedicated team behind snuggs period underwear. “The people behind the scenes at snuggs are crucial. It’s our number one priority to create a safe and fair environment at work, across the entirety of our supply chain.” -Linda and Tomas our founders We believe in transparency, we have nothing to hide. We believe in open communication and a collaborative approach. Our founders actively listen, discuss, and learn from our talented teams, fostering an atmosphere of mutual respect. By doing so, we ensure that working conditions remain not just compliant but thriving. Every worker in our factories is paid a fair working wage, reflecting our commitment to ethical practices and fair compensation. We take pride in our transparent supply chain, meticulously tracing each stage from raw material production to manufacturing. With a clear view of our entire supply chain, we assess all major impact categories, leaving no stone unturned in our pursuit of sustainability. 🟠 snuggs = Kindness to you, others, and the planet. Thomas Zahradnik Linda Sejdova snuggs #PeriodPants #femtech #periodpositive #b2b #sustainability #periods

Dear Irene and dear Kate, I like your approach to how things can change by sharing our understanding of certain situations! Especially in connection with the creation of a sustainable textile industry, I am convinced that this large project can only be transformed into a sustainable textile industry together. This is my contribution to the topic of building a sustainable textile industry. It would be very nice if other experts and scientists could share their opinion in order to achieve the goal more quickly.... Facts of today and solution for tomorrow - Creating a sustainable Textile Industry The facts of today. •20% of the global water polution comes from the textile Industry •79 billion cubic metres of water global consumtion – in 2015 •1 715 million tons of CO2 emissions •92 million tons of waste / year – is increasing as the production is increasing • •It also estimated that by 2030, under a business-as-usual scenario, thesenumbers would increase by at least 50 %. • •Those numbers are put together by GFA and the Boston Consulting Group, estimated that in 2015 - „Pulse of the Fashion Industry report – 2017“ •https://lnkd.in/dWc7xFvn for this topic I organise with ESMA - www.ESMA.com - the second TP&S conference 15 & 16 of Oct. 2024 - www.tps-conference.com - to dive deeper in the opportunities of changing the textile industry to a sustainable textile industry Please contact me for speaking, exhibiting, attending etc ... #sustainability #nextgenerationeu #future #unitingbusiness #innovation #management #technology #transformation #fashion #networking #textilebusiness #sustainabledevelopment #nextgeneration #future #wfh #globalgoals #sustainabledevelopmentgoals #agenda2030 #governments #enterpreneurship #event #circulareconomy #digitalprinting #esg #sdg2030 #togetherforourplanet #climateaction #climatechange #climate #environmental #netzero2050 #leadership #water #wastewater #sustainabledevelopmentgoals #nextgenerationleaders #environmental #biodiversity #sdgs #investment #science #neom #apple #twitterx #microsoft #google #ibm #linkedin #kabani #esma

Empowerment Through Fashion: The MNFT Way Fashion isn’t just about clothing; it’s a form of self-expression and empowerment. At MNFT LLC, our commitment to empowerment extends to every aspect of life, including how we present ourselves to the world. 🌈 Inclusivity: Just like our global MNFT community celebrates diversity, fashion embraces individuality. It’s a canvas for expressing your unique identity. 💃 Innovation: Fashion is a dynamic industry driven by creativity and innovation. Our approach to education mirrors this spirit, encouraging innovative thinking. 💼 Empowerment: Confidence often begins with how we dress. We believe that by feeling good in what you wear, you can unlock your full potential. 🌍 Global Influence: Fashion is a global language, influenced by cultures from around the world. Similarly, our diverse community at MNFT LLC brings together various perspectives. 🚀 Endless Possibilities: Just as there are no limits to fashion, there are no boundaries to learning and growth. With MNFT LLC, the possibilities are endless. Let’s empower ourselves through fashion and education, redefining our paths to success. Join us in shaping a world where confidence and creativity go hand in hand. 💪👗✨ #FashionEmpowerment #MNFTLLC #Innovation #Empowerment

Taurus story: Our Culture Systems- Individually: I know, that business runs through systems and people run the systems. I always look to the system for a solution. If a challenge arises, I use a system correction before I look for a people correction. I use a system solution in my innovation rather than a people solution. I follow the system exactly until a new system is introduced. Team: We emphasize the importance of well-defined systems and processes, enabling efficiency, consistency, and scalability. By adhering to robust systems, we ensure the smooth functioning of our operations. These are not hypotheticals but rather the impactful legacies of women who defied norms and sparked transformative change. 🚀 Beyond inventions, women have shaped industries, broken barriers, and challenged stereotypes. Consider the invaluable contributions of women in STEM fields, from Marie Curie to Rosalind Franklin, whose work revolutionized our understanding of science. 🌈 Today, let's celebrate the women who dared to innovate, to dream beyond societal constraints. Reflect on the technological landscape and consider how it might differ if these visionary women hadn't left their mark. Comment below with your thoughts on the women inventors who have inspired you! ⬇️ Let's honor their legacies and continue championing diversity and inclusion in the world of innovation. 🌍💪 #WomenInInnovation #TechPioneers #DiversityInTech #LinkedInReflections
